text: This playlist is your passport to unlocking the secrets of large language models and their revolutionary impact on artificial intelligence: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL8eNk_zTBST9QRoBroh6KH7DKYB8JVKGA

author: @user-vm9fc1yv2y
text: 07:29 Introduction to Large Language Models and their Applications 14:58 Large Language Models are primarily focused on predicting the next word in a sentence. 22:27 LLMs should be connected with external data to avoid hallucination or making up facts. 29:56 Explanation of machine learning types: unsupervised, supervised, reinforcement 37:25 Large language models consist of billions of parameters and are used for various AI tasks. 44:54 Discussing the background and training data of GPT-2 model 52:23 Byte pair encoding is a good approach for large language models to learn new words and achieve good performance. 59:52 IBM announced Watson X LLM model with multilingual capabilities Crafted by Merlin AI.
